history.narrative: Law 2-30 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-72, which was referred to the Committee on Advisory Neighborhood Commissions. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 28, 1977 and July 12, 1977, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 5, 1977, it was assigned Act No. 2-67 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
